title: $25 code giveaway
body: Hello, I'm giving away $25 RP so add me on league to go into draw.

replies.body:
I have a couple of questions:

1) Is it just anyone who adds you goes into the draw?
2) Would you be wanting them to play games? :P
3) And finally is this a scam?
Just add me then msg me and Iâ€™ll add you to draw
When is this going to end?
